item.name: Qat
entries: The save for addiction to qat is DC 14, but the maximum addiction stage of qat never progresses beyond stage 1.

item.name: Grit
entries: The save for addiction to grit is DC 15, and the addiction has the {@trait virulent} trait.

stages.entry: +1 item bonus to {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Crafting}, and {@skill Performance} checks
+1 item bonus to {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Crafting}, and {@skill Performance} checks, –2 item penalty to {@skill Perception} checks

item.name: Demon Dust
entries: The save for addiction to demon dust is DC 24, and the addiction has the {@trait virulent} trait.

stages.entry: +2 item bonus to {@skill Athletics} checks and treat up to 4 Bulk as being negligible in weight
+2 item bonus to {@skill Athletics} checks, treat up to 4 Bulk as being negligible in weight, and {@condition stupefied||stupefied 1}
{@condition stupefied||stupefied 2} and all memories made since you were first exposed to this dose of demon dust become hazy and vague
{@condition stupefied||stupefied 2} and all memories made in the previous 24 hours become hazy and vague

item.name: Succubus Kiss
entries: The save for addiction to succubus kiss is DC 28, and the addiction has the {@trait virulent} trait.

stages.entry: +2 item bonus to initiative checks and to all saving throws against {@trait emotion} and {@trait mental} effects
as stage 2 plus {@condition blinded||blindness} or {@condition deafened||deafness}
